ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T19:24:31 [Issue ID 4000-407382] urn:comicvine:4000-407382 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 23:48:31. [Issue ID 1724104]
ComicInfo.Summary: When first assembled by Kentaro, the Echo team was comprised of 6 members who were complete strangers to one another except two: Sho and Yuri. Inseparable partners since childhood, they first wanted to conquer the world, but now as adults find themselves trying to save it. Don't miss out as Chapter 0 explores Sho and Yuri's past, from their first meeting to their ultimate recruitment into the team. This issue also includes an exclusive art gallery with sketches and never-before-seen art!
ComicInfo.Title: Chapter 0: Thick as Thieves
